1570208803_137P7ceKGpm24X9C5mxNmp1bCkQpY.body:
Not sure how safe this is, but you could mount your own VPN server, I use SoftEther VPN server. It's a project where volunteers mount their own VPN server for the world to use, but you can configure it to make a private server for only your friends to connect. It's free and supports encryption.
On top of that you can use TOR.

> [d14na](#comment_102_1EAD2zXkzgJf6M7xQ4jG5FHCxUTez9NJJ4): is there a directory of community servers? [...]
The application let's you select a server from a list of volunteers, usually over 100 servers are always running.
